title: FO-03: Swipe Phase
description:
Implement swipe phase with FO-03-specific messaging and checkpoints

## Context

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-01-23-FO-03/2026-01-23-FO-03-spec.md

**Key files for this epic:**
- app/fo-02/components/swipe-phase.tsx - reference swipe UI
- app/fo-02/components/step-checkpoint.tsx - reference checkpoint pattern
- app/fo-03/actions.ts - server actions for generation
notes:
2026-01-23 08:48 - Task 3m6 completed: Refined swipe-phase.tsx with persistent contextual messaging. Changed from isFirstAction (temporary feedback) to hasSwipedOnce (persistent message). The component now shows intro message before first swipe and feedback message after, both as static text rather than animated toasts. Next tasks should wire this up in fo-experience.tsx, ensuring hasSwipedOnce is tracked in state.
2026-01-23 08:51 - Task j8r was already completed in commit 5046cdc. The step-checkpoint.tsx uses a 'variant' prop (batch1/subsequent/transition) instead of batchNumber for cleaner conditional rendering. All copy matches spec exactly. Component is ready for integration in fo-experience.tsx - the next task should wire it up in the swipe phase flow.
2026-01-23 08:55 - Task aos completed: Integrated swipe phase and checkpoints into fo-experience.tsx. The flow is: Step 7 (whatHelps) triggers batch 1 generation -> Step 8 shows loading then swipe cards -> batch1 checkpoint after 10 swipes -> user can continue (batch 2) or finish -> subsequent checkpoint after batch 2 -> user can continue (batch 3) or finish -> transition screen after batch 3 or finish -> Step 10. hasSwipedOnce resets between batches for fresh intro messaging. currentBatchNumber=4 is used as signal for early-finish transition screen.
